solution_line_template: The total planned cost for the party was {cost_per_attendee}*{num_attendees} = $<<{cost_per_attendee}*{num_attendees}={total_contributions}>>{total_contributions}
The total expenses for the party are {total_contributions}-{expenses_less_than_contributions} = $<<{total_contributions}-{expenses_less_than_contributions}={total_expenses}>>{total_expenses}
